name: Federacy
headline: Penetration testing and bug bounty platform.
description: Penetration testing and bug bounty platform.
generated_description:
**Company Overview: Federacy**

Founded in the heart of San Francisco, Federacy operates at the intersection of cybersecurity and innovation. As a penetration testing and bug bounty platform, their mission is straightforward yet essential: to bolster the security posture of modern startups and enterprises alike. Being part of Y Combinator’s Batch S18 certainly adds to their credibility in the tech ecosystem.

**What They Do**

Federacy specializes in conducting detailed **penetration tests**, designed not just to find vulnerabilities, but to simulate real-life attacks on systems, websites, and applications. This rigorous approach includes over 100 hours of manual testing combined with more than 200 individual security checks. Their work satisfies compliance requirements for critical standards like **SOC2, ISO 27001, and HIPAA**, which are vital for any company looking to maintain trust and credibility in the digital age.

**Their Team and Expertise**

With a lean team of just two core members, Federacy's strength lies in the depth of expertise among its employees. The security researchers on board have impressive backgrounds, having honed their skills at prestigious institutions like MIT and Google. Many hold advanced certifications such as OSCP, OSCE, and CISSP, positioning them as knowledgeable allies in the fight against cyber threats.

**Unique Offerings**

Federacy goes beyond just penetration testing. They offer continuous support throughout the year, functioning almost like an outsourced Chief Information Security Officer (CISO). This includes guidance via Slack on a variety of security issues—from architecture to remediation strategies—making them an invaluable partner for startups looking to scale securely.

The company also emphasizes **modern pentesting** methodologies rooted in industry standards like **OWASP's Application Security Verification Standard**, ensuring they are at the forefront of security testing techniques.

**Pricing Strategy**

Federacy's services start at competitive rates, making them accessible for startups while delivering value through flexible team sizes and quick turnaround times. The inclusive nature of their service—like remediation advice and on-demand reporting—sets a new standard in the industry.

**Client Trust**

Federacy has earned the trust of many innovative companies, including well-known names like AngelList and Salesforce, enhancing their reputation as a reliable security partner.

In summary, if you’re a startup looking to solidify your security stance through effective penetration testing and ongoing support, **Federacy** offers a compelling solution. With their expertise, modern methodologies, and an accessible approach to pricing, they’re positioned well to help businesses navigate the complexities of cybersecurity in today’s digital landscape.

For more information, you can check their website at [federacy.com](http://www.federacy.com).
